intro: Psilogramme laxa, commonly known as the slender psilogram, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Apiaceae, which includes carrots and parsley, and is characterized by its finely divided leaves and small, clustered flowers. The plant typically grows in sandy or rocky soils and thrives in full sun. Its delicate appearance and unique structure make it an interesting subject for botanical study. However, it is not widely cultivated for commercial purposes.
